patterns: where is mnnit allahabad ?
responses: At Barrister Mullah Colony, MNNIT Allahabad Campus, Teliarganj, Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh 211004.

patterns: What programs mnnit offers ?
responses: It offers B.E./B.Tech, M.E./M.Tech, MCA, M.S.C, MBA/PGDM, Ph.D.

patterns: What are the types of connectivity in mnnit ?
responses: Wired and wireless internet connectivity is available here.

patterns: How many hostels are there in mnnit ?
responses: There are currently eight boys hostels and four girls hostels.

responses: The room capacity is around 250.

patterns: What is the campus size of mnnit ?
responses: The campus size is 222 acres.

patterns: Is there room facilty for parents/guardians in mnnit ?
responses: Yes, mnnit offers guest house room for accomodation of parents.

patterns: What are the types of extra-curricular activities in mnnit ?

patterns: What are the sports events at mnnit ?
responses: Annual athletics meet.

patterns: What are the technical events at mnnit ?
responses: Avishkar and Codesangam.

patterns: What is the cultural fest of mnnit ?

patterns: How to reach mnnit ?
responses: MNNIT is located about 8 Km from Praygraj Junction and also it has its own domestic airport named Bamrauli airport which is 15 km away from it.

patterns: What are the safety parameters for students in mnnit ?
responses: A lot of guards are available and cameras are installed through out the campus to insure safety of students.

patterns: Is there any campus intime for students ?
responses: There is an intime of 8:30 pm for first year students, No intime for boys other than first year, and an intime of 10 pm for non-first year girls.

patterns: Do hostels have their own mess ?
responses: Yes, Hostels at mnnit have their own mess facilities.

patterns: Is the mess charge included in the fees ?
responses: No, mess charges are applicable to hostellers after registration.

patterns: What is the capacity of rooms in girls hostel ?
responses: There are double occupancy rooms in girls hostel.

patterns: What is the capacity of rooms in boys hostel ?
responses: First year boys are given triple occupancy rooms, double occupancy rooms for second and third year boys, and single occupancy for final year boys.

patterns: What are the facilities given in hostel rooms ?
responses: Rooms are airy and are equiped with beds, study table, and tubelight.

patterns: Are there medical facilities available in mnnit ?
responses: Yes, there is a dispensary and and a medical shop inside the campus.

patterns: Where different outdoor sports are played in mnnit ?

patterns: What are the canteen facilities at mnnit ?
responses: There are some canteens in the campus and also inside hostels.

patterns: Do hostel mess provide non-veg food ?
responses: No, there is no facility of non-veg food in mess.

patterns: Are electricity and water supply good in mnnit ?
responses: Yes, the eclectricity and water supply is pretty good here.

patterns: Do hostels have parking facility ?
responses: Yes, but the parking is only for cycles, as no motor vehicles is allowed for students.

patterns: Is it allowed to roam in the entire campus ?
responses: Roaming inside the campus is allowed, but there there is an intime factor for the students.

patterns: When was MNNIT established ?
responses: It was established as one of the seventeen Regional Engineering Colleges of India in the year 1961 as a joint enterprise of Government of India and Government of Uttar Pradesh, and was an associated college of University of Allahabad, which is the third oldest university in India.

patterns: How is the placement scenario at MNNIT?
responses: Our college MNNIT has excellent placement records. For the 2023 passed-out batch, the average package was 20.34 LPA. Approximately 92% of the total eligible students got placed here. The highest package was 1.35 crore per annum.(As per https://www.shiksha.com ).
